### HR Policy Development Consultant (TSPS) Tender Announcement 
#### Reference Number
 cb-3878-48845950

#### Publication Date
 20 February 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
 6 March 2023, 14:00:00 EST

#### Expected Contract Start and End Dates
 The contract is expected to begin on 1 April 2023 and end on 31 March 2026.

#### Solicitation Number and Status
 The solicitation number for this Request for Proposal (RFP) is 379. This tender announcement has expired.

#### Summary of Requirement
The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) is seeking the services of a qualified HR Policy Development Consultant to review and enhance its HR and Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) Policy Suite. The policy review will be conducted through the lens of mental health, accessibility, diversity and inclusion, and Gender-based Analysis Plus (GBA+).

#### Examples of Tasks to be Undertaken by the Consultant
- Review and analyze HR and OHS policies, directives, guidelines, terms and conditions of employment, and tools.
- Conduct a lens review of policy suite through mental health, accessibility, diversity and inclusion, and GBA+.
- Develop and present recommendations to the OAG on its HR and OHS policies.

#### Eligibility Criteria
 Consultants must be able to demonstrate expertise in developing HR policies and conducting policy reviews through the lens of diversity, inclusion, and mental health.

#### Request for Proposals
 Bidders interested in supporting this project are invited to submit their proposals to the address indicated below.

#### Address for Bids

 Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0G6
 Canada
